tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE WasteCollection (
  pick_up_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  location VARCHAR(255),
  waste_type VARCHAR(50),
  pickup_date DATE,
  pickup_time TIME,
  is_recurring BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE WasteCollectionSchedule (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    pickup_date DATE,
    pickup_time TIME,
    pickup_location TEXT,
    status TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE RecyclingPickups (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    pickup_date DATE,
    pickup_time TIME,
    pickup_location TEXT,
    recycle_items TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE WasteCollectionSchedule (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    pickup_date DATE NOT NULL,
    pickup_time TIME NOT NULL,
    truck_id INT NOT NULL,
    waste_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE RecyclingPickups (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    pickup_date DATE NOT NULL,
    pickup_time TIME NOT NULL,
    recycled_material VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    pickup_location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE PickupHistory (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    pickup_id INT NOT NULL,
    pickup_date DATE NOT NULL,
    pickup_status VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
    pickup_notes TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE WasteCollectionLocations (
    location_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    street_address VARCHAR(255),
    city VARCHAR(100),
    zip_code VARCHAR(10),
    location_type ENUM('residential', 'commercial'),
    collection_schedule JSONB
);

CREATE TABLE CollectionTrucks (
    truck_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    truck_model VARCHAR(255),
    current_location VARCHAR(255),
    last_maintenance_date DATE,
    is_active BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE WasteCollectionSchedule (
    schedule_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location_id INT,
    truck_id INT,
    collection_date DATE,
    collection_status ENUM('pending', 'completed'),
    CONSTRAINT fk_location FOREIGN KEY (location_id) REFERENCES WasteCollectionLocations(location_id),
    CONSTRAINT fk_truck FOREIGN KEY (truck_id) REFERENCES CollectionTrucks(truck_id)
);

CREATE TABLE RecyclingPickupLocations (
    pickup_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location_id INT,
    pickup_date DATE,
    pickup_status ENUM('scheduled', 'completed', 'cancelled'),
    CONSTRAINT fk_location FOREIGN KEY (location_id) REFERENCES WasteCollectionLocations(location_id)
);

CREATE TABLE RecyclableMaterials (
    material_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    material_name VARCHAR(255),
    material_type ENUM('plastic', 'glass', 'metal', 'paper'),
    disposal_method ENUM('recycle', 'landfill'),
    is_recyclable BOOLEAN
);
